Xarray's 2022 User Survey is live now. Please take ~5 minutes to fill it out and help us improve Xarray.

docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfnMd8UsC1XP1lPuFczl148VfpmwnFu4a0Z94odt1L6U0R0Pw/viewform

We've just released v2022.06.0!

This release brings

  • a major internal refactor of the indexing functionality. This will allow easier indexing of curvilinear grids, unstructured grids, and accounting for bounds variable in the future
  • the use of flox for faster groupby operations (though dask improvements need some opt-in keyword arguments)
  • and experimental support for the new Python Array API standard.

See the release notes for a full list of changes.
Cool!! So the indexing should work with the POP grid now? Will try it immediately!
no :frown: not yet! This was all infrastructure work so far.
ah ok, I'm looking at the release notes now, looks like many great additions and improvements!
